text: Once Upon a Time, Cinema (, meaning Naser al-din Shah, Actor of Cinema) is a 1992 Iranian fantasy comedy movie directed by Mohsen Makhmalbaf. It stars Ezzatolah Entezami, Mehdi Hashemi, Akbar Abdi, Mohammad-Ali Keshavarz, Fatemeh Motamed-Arya. ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 comedy movies Category:1992 fantasy movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Mohsen Makhmalbaf
title: Once Upon a Time, Cinema
